# Installation

```{r}
BiocManager::install('seandavi/MungeCuragedMGS')
```

# Data entities

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(MungeCuratedMGS)
```

## Signatures

```{r}
sig_table = create_signatures_table()
head(sig_table)
```



## Ontologies

### EFO

```{r}
efo = get_efo()
head(efo)
```

### UBERON

```{r}
uberon = get_uberon()
head(uberon)
```

Ontologies can be combined like so:

```{r}
library(dplyr)
full_ontologies = dplyr::bind_rows(uberon, efo)
```
